thread.title: Selena Gomez fans react to rumors fiance Benny Blanco will play live-action Tangled heartthrob
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez fans react to rumors fiance Benny Blanco will play live-action Tangled heartthrob

author: Jacqueline Lindenberg
title: Selena Gomez fans react to rumors fiance Benny Blanco will play live-action Tangled heartthrob
text:
Last month in December, Variety reported that a live-action adaptation was in the works - with Michael Gracey in talks to direct. Selena Gomez fans have shared their reactions to rumors that her fiancé Benny Blanco is being considered to play heartthrob Flynn Rider in Disney's live-action remake of Tangled (2010).
Since the announcement, speculation on who could be cast in the leading roles for the upcoming project have circulated throughout social media.
Some have previously demanded that Sabrina Carpenter play Rapunzel while others suggested that Kathryn Hahn should take on the role of Mother Gothel.
And this week, new rumors arose that Blanco, 36, could possibly portray Flynn Rider -a character that was voiced by Zachary Levi in the original movie that released nearly 15 years earlier.
Social media users took to X to share their thoughts on the latest casting rumor, with one penning, 'Don't ruin this movie for me.'
Selena Gomez fans have shared their reactions to rumors that her fiancé Benny Blanco, 36, is being considered to play Flynn Rider in Disney's live-action remake of Tangled (2010); seen in October 2024 in L.A.
Last month in December, Variety reported that a live-action adaptation was in the works - with Michael Gracey in talks to direct
Another wrote, 'I'm sorry but n I've been waiting for this live action,' while a fan added, 'Are we being fr fr LIKE WHAT.'
One shared that Flynn Rider and Blanco, 'look nothing alike I know it has nothing to do with it but ya.'
'Nah pls tell me this is FAKE cuz hell no im not buying this live action anymore,' one X user typed, while another penned, 'He's not an actor be serious.'
One fan expressed, 'Selena, take your man to the studio do not let him audition for anything!'
Another suggested that Sabrina Carpenter and Taylor Zakhar Perez take on the roles of Rapunzel and Rider by penning, 'should have been this.'
'You meant Zayn Malik,' one said of the former One Direction member, while a social media user shared that Blanco is 13 years older than Flynn Rider's age in the movie.
Another typed, 'Haha, Benny Blanco as…
Jacqueline Lindenberg
